text: Etu nimite, sabi, Ami tumikhan ke bhabobadi aru gyaani aru niyom likha khan ke pathai ase. Kunba khan ke tumikhan pora morai dibo aru Cross uporte maribo, aru kunba khan ke tumikhan Isor laga kotha kora ghor te tumikhan pora chabuk pora maribo aru ekta sheher pora dusra sheher laga bahar te khedai dibo.
